# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#2)

#### Question

Do we see Verin in
*Towers of Midnight*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I know what you're trying to figure out. (Who's Nakomi?) R.A.F.O. (Read And Find Out.)
